Manoharī：A king of Thaton who later became a vassal of Anorata of Burma．

It is said that flames issued from his mouth when he spoke，till Anorata made him eat food taken from a holy shrine．

Manoharī，confounded by the loss of his power，sold a gem and erected two great images of the Buddha．Sās．64； Bode，op．cit．，13，14，15．
